attributes.action: close all retail outlets on bank holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as every year passes by retail shop are staying open more and more . town centres now open normal trading hours on bank holidays and supermarkets have even asked to open on christmas day. instead of making more bank holidays lets just use the ones we have . ie making companys close the the staff can have the days with family and if no shops are open maybe familys will go and spend the day at the beach or park instead of more shopping.
